about_the_game:
Add to Your Wishlist

Please add my game to your wishlist! I really need your support, and your subscription means the world to me.

Story Background

You were struck by the demon king's magic and turned into a sword, then fell into a well.
As a sword, you embark on a journey to climb the mountain, defeat the demon king, and regain your human form!

The Talking Stone

There's a talking stone that has been sealed here for 100 years. It's very lonely.

A Climbing Game

This is not just a climbing game—there are also monsters! If they catch you, you might fall back down the mountain. But don’t worry, you can fight back, after all, you are a sword!

How to Play

Even though you’ve been sealed as a sword, you can still move! It's truly amazing! Players can rotate the body, jump, climb, and even engage in combat!

Challenge the Peak

Strive to reach the peak! You might slip and fall a great distance, but don’t worry, you could also leap to great heights unexpectedly. The unpredictable ups and downs make the journey feel like a roller coaster!

Multiple Paths

During your climb, you may find that there are multiple paths—some more difficult, some easier. There could be surprising traps, or perhaps hidden shortcuts that help you soar! Every road leads to Rome, so find the path that suits you best!


Come on, use all your skills and strategy to reach the highest peak!

name: I Was Turned Into A Sword
short_description: You've been turned into a sword by the demon king!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
